column1: 129kph, inswinger, good length, he is forward and defending
beaten trying to drive a ball that doesn't swing. It was full and hinted to shape back but just held the line as Warner groped at a drive
full and clipped beautifully wide of mid on! There is a midwicket in place but he juts used the pace and placed it between the two fielders and it raced away
full on the pads, he clips this to midwicket
132kph, good length, angled across, he leaves watchfully
126kph, good length, hint of shape back, he is forward pushing a drive to mid off
magnificent drive on the rise past mid off! It was a decent length outside off, he stood tall on the front foot and crunched it past mid off
back of a length, he stands tall and defends with the full face
fuller on off, angled in, he drives firmly with the full face to mid on
good length, 138kph, angled into off, he defends pushing this to midwicket

a pure straight drive down the ground! He did this with such ease. It was slightly over-pitched and he just leaned forward, eased the bat through the line and it went straight past the stumps to the sightscreen
good length, wide of off, he leaves this alone on the front foot
130kph, full and angled across, he reaches out to square drive but mis-times it back to the bowler
134kph, good length, on leg, he is defending compactly from the crease
131kph, good length, fourth stump line, hint of shape back and he leaves
129kph, fuller outside off, he drives on the rise, neatly to cover
131kph, very full, shaping into off, his head falls a touch as he drags a drive to mid on
130kph, good length, angled across and he leaves it alone on the front foot
136kph, over-pitched, another superb straight drive but Pradeep sticks his right foot out like a goalkeeper and makes the stop
137kph, good length, fourth stump line, he drives on the up powerfully straight to cover point
136kph, short ball, he swivels to pull but it stops in the surface a touch, he mistimes it to mid on
138kph, wide of the crease angled in and he clips this beautifully wide of mid on and it just beats Isuru as he dives on the rope!
good length, he defends off a thick inside edge and it runs through forward square
141kph, short on the hip, he's back and tucking this to square leg
132kph, angled down leg, he glances this neatly down to fine leg
130kph, full, he drives uppishly back past the bowler, straight of mid off for a couple
132kph, good length on middle, he defends solidly from the crease
130kph, good length, shaping back into leg, he works this off the pad to square leg
132kph, half volley, he drives powerfully with a bottom hand punch to mid off
130kph, good length, tucking up Warner on the pads, he works this to square leg
138kph, good length, angled into off, he defends with pad and bat close together
140kph, half volley, he drives superbly wide of mid off but Malinga makes a diving stop
139kph, shorter length, he's back and working this nicely through forward square to the sweeper
138kph, fuller outside off, he pushes nicely on the front foot through the gap at cover-point and the timing yields two
135kph, fuller on off, he pushes firmly on the front foot to mid off
141kph, good length, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
full outside off, he pushes on the front foot to point
glorious straight drive! Finch looks in superb touch. It was over-pitched, he held his shape and balance and punched it down the ground
good length, into leg stump, he clips this neatly through square leg for a couple
131kph, good length, angled across the right hander and he leaves comfortably
driven powerfully to mid off and Thisara misfields to allow four! He was struck really hard but Thisara rolled straight over it
131kph, half volley, he cracks a cover drive straight to the fielder
slices a square drive through point! It was full and angled across, Warner reached out and placed it nicely through the gap at point and it raced away
140kph, fuller on off, he pushes a drive to cover
133kph, bouncer, too high and called wide, the keeper can't glove it cleanly and they pinch an extra
138kph, full, outside off, he leans into a nice drive straight to cover
full outside off again, he drives to cover and a misfield allows a single
137kph, good length, angled across, he pushes neatly through cover-point, they get one but another misfield allows an easy second
shorter length into the hip, he tucks this through square leg comfortably
good length, outside off, he leaves
good length, on off, he defends from the crease
fuller on off, he pushes towards cover
back of a length on off, he is back and defending
angled into middle and leg, 128kph, he works this through midwicket
back of a length, 130kph, wide of off, he's back and punching this to cover
130kph, on the hip, he tucks this away through square leg for a single
cracked through cover and the skipper misses it! This is a 130kph half volley and he climbs into it, it just bounces awkwardly short of Dimuth it gets through him
short and wide and smoked through point! Bad ball this. 128kph, short and wide and a huge gap at cover-point was easy enough for Finch to find.
full on off, he drives firmly back to the bowler
126kph, over-pitched on off, he drives, without much timing, to cover
129kph, good length wide of off, he leaves this alone
129kph, good length wide of off, he's back and punching this to backward point
good length, angled into off, he defends on the front foot
128kph, full outside off, he pushes on the front foot, opening the face to point
angled into leg, he clips this through midwicket for a couple
129kph, short and wide, he's back and cutting with control to deep point
128kph, good length, angled wide of off, he sits back and cuts with a bottom hand jab to deep point
125kph, shorter on the hip, it comes off the thigh guard and rolls away to square leg but the man is back, Finch sprints back to pinch two

huge appeal for LBW given not out. Sri Lanka take their time but they eventually review. Good length, nipping back from outside off, he thrust bat and pad at the ball together. Was it pad first? It was. Just. Now is outside the line? The impact is umpire's call on the line. It was hitting the stumps. Not out remains. Sri Lanka keep their review
133kph, good length outside off, he pushes slowly towards cover and they run a tight one. Good early call from Finch and response from Warner
133kph, good length, angled across, he defends on the front foot to point
short and wide, 130kph, way too wide of off and called
129kph, back of a length, he punches off the back foot to deep cover point
good length, 130kph, he pushes forward and gets a thick outside that runs to third man
short and wide, he sits back and thumps a cut shot to deep point
good length, angled into off, he's back and nudging this wide of mid on
fuller outside off, he punches on the up to cover
128kph, short outside off, he sits back and pulls behind square into the gap between deep square and fine leg for two
130kph, good length, angled across and he defends on the front foot
135kph, shorter outside off, he's punching firmly off the back foot straight of deep cover-point for a couple
128kph, shorter outside off, he mistimes a cut but finds the gap getting it out to deep cover-point
133kph, full on middle and off, he drives to mid on
131kph, full and a hint of shape in, he drives but gets it off the inside half of the bat through square leg to the sweeper
130kph, good length, outside off, he's half forward pushing at it, getting a thick edge that runs past backward point, another misfield allows one
he walks at Thisara, who bangs in, he's standing up and working this off the hip through square leg
good length, on off, he's forward and defending back to the bowler
full on off, driven back to the bowler
tossed up, he drives handsomely to long on for one
he skips down to a full ball drifting in and clips it to deep long on
flatter on leg, he sits back and works this through square leg
drifting in and sliding on, he mistimes a drives off the thick inside half of the bat to midwicket
tossed up, he pushes uppishly but safely to cover
good length, angled into off, he defends on the front foot
131kph, good length wide of off, he drives fluently on the rise to deep cover-point
125kph, back of a length outside off, he is back and defending with soft hands to cover-point and pinching one
127kph, good length on off, he defends from the crease
131kph, good length on off, he is on the walk defending with the full face
129kph, wide of off, he climbs into it, thumping a drive on the up to the sweeper in the deep at cover
flatter and shorter on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
tossed up on off, he drives firmly to long on
drifting into off, he defends on the front foot

bowled him! Well bowled from Dhananjaya. Warner got in a tangle. It was a good length, drifting in and skidding on, Warner pressed forward initially, then pressed back to give room to cut but it was too full and it crashed into middle
drifts in a full delivery, defended
shortens his length, he goes back into the crease and blocks
steered behind point, down to square third man. Impressive half-century for Finch. Has a job to do though
slants a length delivery across, defended towards point
nice, tight line. Length on the stumps, hint of angle away, defended back
steered wide of point
touch fuller, around off, Finch is well forward as he stabs it away
cramped for room as he punches this wide of cover
drifts away from the batsman, driven straight to cover
punched to mid-on for an easy single
slider back in from around the stumps, eased wide of cover
too short, he rocks back and slaps this to deep cover
pushed through quicker on the stumps, kept out
punched to deep cover again
beauty! Slants one across the batsman, beaten on the drive
thick outside edge, races past the vacant third slip to the third man boundary. Lucky runs
dug in short on leg stump, Khawaja ducks under it and looks away as this zips over his helmet
angles this down to square third man
punched on the up to deep cover

skiddy bouncer, excellent bouncer. Seemed a lot faster than the 134kph on the speed gun. Khawaja was looking to sway out of the way but realised it was too quick and suddenly had to look away as he ducked.
fuller and faster on the stumps, defended
not much turn, just skids through on a length, punched back
extra bounce off a length, turns this to short midwicket
works this wide of midwicket as they jog the single
driven into the gap at extra cover
right back into the crease as he punches this to midwicket

huge appeal for lbw, will Sri Lanka review? No, they don't. Pradeep slants this across, Khawaja is looking to run it down to third man but is beaten. Played it with an angled bat. Appeared to be some sound as it passed through on real time, but nothing on snicko.
half-pulls this down to fine leg, this one rushed through
Beaten! Was looking to play a short-arm jab but this one nipped back in to cut into two halves. Excellent from Pradeep
attacks the stumps, Finch feels for this and squirts this off a thick inside edge to fine leg
excellent short ball, once again rushes through as Khawaja looks away and ducks simultaneously.
punches this full-length delivery to extra cover
turns this flatter delivery on off-stump to midwicket
good grab down leg. Short and sliding down, Finch was looking for a powerful sweep to beat short fine.
makes room and punches this past cover, down to the boundary rider but the running is top notch. Udana caught napping in the deep.
drills this down to long-off to raise Australia's 100
eases this to point from the crease

first Warner, now Khawaja and Sri Lanka back in this! This is nicely tossed up, drifting in from around the stumps, Khawaja looks to sweep - takes him on with the short boundary in sight - hits it well but picks out Udana at deep midwicket. Massive blow.
slants this in from wide of the crease, tucked down to fine leg
short of length ball that nips back in from outside off, Smith is hit on the thigh pad as he hops across to whip it square
whipped to deep square to get off the mark
attacks the stumps, gets this to jag back in off the seam, plays down the wrong line and squirts this off a thick inside edge to short midwicket
beaten on the pull. Had to fetch it from outside off, was too early into this stroke. Good effort ball from Pradeep.

he's picked the bones out of this! Dropped short, looking to bowl a bouncer but this one doesn't bounce as much and Finch hammers this pull behind square. Sails into the stands. Was waiting for it and put it away disdainfully when it did.
lunges forward and stabs this to short mid-on
drilled back to the bowler
punches to short midwicket, diving stop by the skipper
turns this wide of square leg for a quick single
squirts one off a thick inside edge to long-on
good stop off his own bowling, this was hit back hard. Dhananjaya threw himself to his right to stop a certain single
slower and fuller on the stumps, eased to long-on
works this from outside off towards deep midwicket
cutter on a length, dabbed wide of the diving point fielder
goes full and across, Smith exposes middle and leg stump as he walks across to defend back
whips this into the acres of open space at deep midwicket
full toss on middle and Smith wrists this imperiously to pick the gap at deep midwicket. Strong bottom hand and powerful wrists
through with the pull even before the ball arrived, but this was slipping down leg.
punched back to the bowler
eased down to long-on
gets to the pitch and eases this down to long-on as they jog the single
slapped to long-off, this was short and he made room to play the stroke
gets well forward and defends
whips this down to deep midwicket
steered down to square third man
once again just a gentle little dab down to third man
walks across and whips this full delivery on off to Malinga at deep square leg
gorgeous straight dive, long-on comes around to cut that off
driven firmly but straight to mid-off
smears this square drive behind point. Too full from Udana, made it easy as Smith shuffles across and then reached out to find the gap.
he's helped this along to beat short fine. Poor, sliding down and all he had to do was get some bat. Easy pickings
he's heaved this deep into the stands at long-on! Saw it tossed up, got to the pitch and muscled it away. Races into the 80s with a 92-metre hit.
again! Thumped. Absolutely thumped. Too full, right into his swinging arc, Finch ain't gonna miss out. He's warmed up properly. No spin, no drift, angles in and boom!
slides it down leg as he changes his angle to bowl from around the stumps
leading edge, rolls past mid-off for a single. Better from Dhananjaya
eased down to long-on
quicker length ball on middle and leg, worked to deep square
slips this on middle and leg, worked to deep square
banged in short but this isn't the Lasith of 2007, Smith gets on top of the bounce and nudges it gently into the leg side
gentle tap into the off side as Malinga bowls a tight line.
slower one down leg, Finch didn't pick it early, thought this was coming right at his body. Then realised it wasn't and tried to get down to lap, but missed
squeezed into the leg side, past midwicket
pulled from outside off towards deep midwicket, Udana comes around to cut that off
dipping yorker, Smith is a long way across as he tucks this down to fine leg
long hop sliding down and Smith helps it along behind square.
reaches out and smears this drive to sweeper cover, good stop.
rocks back and cuts to point.
reaches out and drives inside-out to deep cover
looks to hoick, gets a thick inside edge that flies past off stump and whacks the keeper's gloves. Lucky not to drag back
eased with the spin to deep cover
full toss and Smith gleefully takes a step across and punches it to the cover boundary. Easy pickings. Harmless pies from Malinga
slower bouncer outside off, way over the batsman's head, wide called and rightly so
slower length ball outside off, guided to point
slower and fuller on the stumps, Smith works this behind square
squirts this length delivery to backward point. Oh, dear. There were only four men inside the ring. No-ball and Australia will get a free-hit. Malinga is not amused. Excellent from the umpires.
right into the blockhole, dug out, rolls to mid-off. Right on the money this time from Malinga
dipping yorker which he turns to midwicket from outside off
slower and fuller on the stumps, eased to long-on
sliding into middle and leg, tucks this straight to square leg
lofted through the line, shoveled to bring up a century! Glorious. This has been a classy innings from the skipper.
swept powerfully but this is an excellent stop at short fine, picked out the lone man there.
works this down to deep midwicket
squeezes this yorker-length delivery to long-off
sliding down, Finch gets some pad on this as it rolls to short fine leg, quick single. In fact leg byes called
punches this short of length delivery to cover
forced on the up to deep point
nice and full outside off, Smith takes a step across and drills this straight to extra cover
rasping drive into the gap at sweeper cover
length ball on middle and leg, worked wide of midwicket for a quick single
mistimes a cut but has hit it enough to get it to deep point
slower length ball, mistimed to cover
driven imperiously, not even a half-stop by mid-off is enough to prevent it from racing to the long boundary. Superb
hops back and across as he defends
lost his shape as he looked to hoick this slower delivery across the line, got a thick inside edge onto the pad
whips uppishly, lands short of midwicket though
works this gently into the gap between midwicket and square leg
123kph, good length, he defends with soft hands short of cover to get one
129kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to backward point
edged and it races fine of third man. He was back trying to play an expansive back foot drive and got a genuine edge but there's no slip in place and it flew to the rope
he steps outside off, Thisara goes wider, he punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
129kph, fuller and wider, he anchors the feet and square drives firmly to deep cover-point
128kph, he tries a back foot drive, gets a thick inside edge onto pad and it rolls into the off side for a single
short ball, he pulls firmly through square leg to the sweeper
off spinning slower ball, he defends to point, Smith backs up too far as Finch sends him back, the throw forced Smith to dive but it was wide
129kph, good length angled across, he sits back and late cuts to backward point on the circle
130kph, play and miss trying to run this with the angle to third man. A touch of extra bounce and some nip away
126kph, back of a length on off, he's back and across in trademark style and working this to square leg
clubbed over cover! Shocking delivery. It was a short slower ball that just sat in the wicket and said 'hit me', Finch waited and slapped it flat over cover
full on off, he drives firmly to mid on
good length, fifth stump line, he is back and square driving to deep point
good length top of off, he sits back and pushes this to gap at cover-point
131kph, full outside off, he tries to heave over midwicket but miscues, dragging it through square leg
cracking cut shot! Short and wide, he's camped in position early and thumping it past backward point like a missile!
122kph, good length, outside off, he sits back pushes this with control through point
upper cut high and safe landing short of fine third man. It was banged in short and he lifted it with the bounce but only gets one
138kph, back of a length, he's punching off the back foot but can't beat cover
130kph, back of a length, he's back and across and working this behind square to bring up a half-century for Smith. There are some boos but plenty of applause
clears the front leg and scythes this away over cover, Udana runs around the rope and saves three! That was good stop
shorter length, on off, he is back and working this behind square
mistimed pull shot just clears midwicket! It was banged in, he tried to pull but it hurried him, he mistimed it but it just ballooned over midwicket's head as he was tight in on the one
128kph, good length outside off, he works this skilfully with his wrists behind square
launched over deep square! He sat and waited for length and got it, clearing the front leg and mowing it flat over square leg into the stands! That was a crowd killer!
cut in the air just past backward point! It was short and wide and created some more room staying leg side to cut it hard, it was in the air but the diving Dhananjaya couldn't reach it
128kph, yorker on off, he jams down, bunting out into the off side
127kph, good length outside off, he square drives to deep cover point
he sits back to a fuller ball, punches off the back foot to cover but can't beat the man
whipped behind square and he finds the gap! Attempted yorker, it was very full, he sat deep in the crease and whipped it off his toes and the timing got it to the rope
brilliant late cut running it fine of third man! He was surprised by the extra bounce but leaned back and guided it fine. Excellent skill
full, tailing down leg, he glances this fine to long leg
backs away and thumps this over cover! He gave room early, freed the arms and thrashed it flat over cover!
pulled wide of fine leg! A gift of a short ball, rib high, down leg, he just pulled it behind square into the gap!
nearly a run out! He got a low full toss, clipped it straight to midwicket and called yes, Dimuth gathered, had a stump and a half to hit and missed! He would have been out
length on leg, he whips this over square leg, one bounce four! 150 for the skipper! He celebrates
129kph, full on middle, he swings hard dragging it with the bottom hand along ground through midwicket to the sweeper
Smith walked at Malinga who fires a slower ball miles down leg
he walks down and squares up, gets a length ball wide of off, he punches to cover and takes one
130kph, full outside off, he clears the left leg and slices this down to long off along the ground
slower ball wide of off, he glides this behind point but picks out the man on the circle
Boom over midwicket! This was in the slot, almost on a tee, he swung across the line and middled it, and the sound was so loud from the middle of the bat. Like a gun shot. It went 20 rows back
full outside off, he backs away and scythes this to cover
slower ball, outside off, 101kph, he whips this wide of long on, he pushes for two and a misfield allows it
133kph, good length outside off, he whips it with the angle through square leg

skied to cover! Slower ball does the trick! This was well bowled. A back of the hand slower ball at 97kph, Finch cleared the left leg to launch but the extra bounce and lack of pace saw him sky it straight up to cover and the skipper calmly claimed the catch. The end of a wonderful innings.
138kph, yorker, well bowled, he dugs this out and they scamper through for a single
121kph, high bouncer, Maxwell wanders around then backs away, paddling a pull shot behind square with control
129kph, half volley, he plays a conventional straight drive, straight of long off and they get two
full outside off, he tries to drag this to the on side, miscuing it down the ground to long on
bowled him with a cracking yorker! The clock says 130kph but that looked quicker. Smith tried to whip this behind square but it slid under the bat and hit the outside of off stump. Vintage Lasith!
slower ball full toss, 111kph, surprises Marsh, he bunts it to backward point
131kph, low full toss, he whips this off the toe of the bat to long on
121kph, slower ball on leg, he works this off his pads to midwicket
chest high short ball, he thumps this over mid on! The man was up and Maxwell knew what was coming, he gave room and clubbed it flat
And again all this way this time over long on! A length slower ball this time, mid on is up, Maxwell sits and waits and thumps it over the long on rope
yorker, into leg stump, he digs this out back to the bowler, it hits the stumps at the non striker's and prevents some runs
attempted yorker, he shovels this forward of square! Great power with the bottom hand to whip this square and the man on the rope could not cut it off with a dive
high full toss clubbed to deep midwicket! Horrible delivery. They just moved deep midwicket squarer and they he gives a gift
top edge over the keeper! A good bouncer, he tried to pull off balance, cramped for room, gets a top edge and it flies over Kusal Perera and away for four!
slower ball, 111kph, length on leg stump, he tucks this fine for a single
131kph, attempted yorker, he whips this with a flourish through square leg to the sweeper
slower ball on off, he drives with one hand on the bat to cover
slower ball, length on leg, it bounces a touch, he misses trying to work to leg, it comes of thigh and rolls away for a leg bye
132kph, half volley, he opens the face and minces a square drive straight to deep cover-point. He's annoyed he found the sweeper
full into leg stump, he clips this straight to midwicket
back of a hand slower ball dragged down leg
length slower ball, he's back and just bunting this into the leg side. He was surprised by the bounce
full and wide sliced behind point
102kph, yorker, nearly bowls him! What a delivery! Completely deceived him but just missed leg
full 135kph yorker, he digs this out, driving it to long off
wide yorker, 124kph, almost a full toss, Marsh swings hard but misses

caught at deep midwicket! Well bowled! Back of the hand slower ball, outside off, he tries to heave this to the long boundary at deep midwicket, doesn't get it and Siriwardana takes the catch easily 10m inside the rope
he walks at the bowler, gets half volley and pings it along the ground to deep midwicket
117kph slower ball, on leg, he checks his shot pushing this to cover
113kph, slower ball, he waits and lofts this neatly over, cover, the two men in the deep try and work together, but Udana flicked it over Siriwardana's head and it allowed three
very full outside off, he miscues, dragging it off the toe of the bat towards long on
nearly a direct hit! Full toss, he drives straight to cover, the man on the circle, Kusal Mendis has time to steady and fire but he misses. Carey was well out
quality yorker on off, he can only dig it out into the off side

Brilliant run out from Udana! Ridiculously good in fact! The back of the hand slower ball was brilliant in itself, forced Maxwell to check his shot, pushing to long on, Udana dived across full stretch, stopped it one handed. Both batsmen retreated. Udana rolled over and threw the non striker's stumps down with Carey just short as he dove back! Magnificent work
sliced just over Mathews at backward point! Another great slower ball forces a mistake from Maxwell, he was through the shot too soon but he just spooned it over backward point!

another direct hit from Udana! This is superb! He nails the yorker, Cummins digs it out on the on side and takes off, Udana whips across like a leopard, Cummins is sent back by Maxwell, Udana gathers, steadies, fires and hits with Cummins miles out at the striker's end!
wide half volley, he drives firmly to long off
full on leg, he clips this through midwicket and they sprint back for two
nearly another direct hit from Udana! Slower ball, Maxwell gets a leading edge back to the bowler, he misfields, they pinch a run as Udana cleans up and the throw is wide
full and wide, he reaches out and hammers a square drive to deep cover-point
126kph, full on leg, he whips this off his toes through midwicket the sweeper in the deep
wide yorker, he steps outside off and steers this behind point to the man in the deep at wide third man
123kph, full on leg, he clips this wide of long on for a couple
125kph, low full toss, he drives this firmly to long on

he whips this from outside off stump through square leg! Not quite a six but a seriously good shot! That was an excellent wide yorker, he stepped outside off and whipped it with the bottom hand just past square leg and the man at deep midwicket can't cut it off!
edged and it races down to square third man where Kane Richardson mops it up
length ball veering in from wide of the crease, Kusal is hit high on the pad as he plays outside the line. Beat him on the inside edge. Good bowling
uppish but into the gap! Scorching drive between cover and point.
rip roaring yorker, Kusal is thrown off balance as he squeezes this between his legs and past the keeper. Came off the pad. Finch and Australia don't review. Good call.
steered over the diving Maxwell at point, down to square third man. Richardson had to move to his left this time, comfortably back for the second run

stands tall and spanks this wide of point. Got on top of the bounce, used the width and let his timing do the rest. Superb from the skipper. Sri Lanka couldn't have asked for a better start. Gets their fans going, the flags are out
helped along to fine leg. Did he get some bat on it? Yes, a very faint one onto the thigh pad. He was hurried for pace first up.
slants a short of length delivery across, left alone
full on the pads and Dimuth nearly flicks this into the gap past the diving square leg fielder. The ball slows up near the boundary. Excellent wrist work
he's blasted this pull in front of square, tracer bullet stuff! Picked the length early and flat-batted this disdainfully. This is an excellent start for Sri Lanka, stand-and-deliver stuff
much fuller and straighter, squirts this into the off side

pulled! This is even better. Right off the middle. Into the gap between midwicket and square leg. Short square boundary that side and at the moment, there's just one winner in this battle. Magnificent approach to the chase. Can Sri Lanka sustain this?
driven back but Starc stops it with his boot on his followthrough. Was timed beautifully though
hops back into the crease and defends back this length delivery. Speedgun clocks that at 149kph
squared up, gets a thick edge and Richardson comes around at third man to stop
on the floor! Yorker honing into the leg at 150kph, Dimuth falls over as he tries to negotiate that.
ducks under this ripper of a bouncer angling in from wide of the crease
beaten for pace, looks to tuck it square but this brushes his thigh pad on the way through to the keeper.
punches this length delivery straight to point
hits him low on the bat as he tries to drive, rolls to mid-off. The ball is thudding into the bat than it being the other way. Cummins working up serious pace.
looks to drive, gets a thick inside edge past midwicket
mistimes this straight drive back to the bowler. Once again late on the shot, toe-ended it.
beaten as he looks to slash this with a closed bat face. Lucky to not get an edge.

gorgeous! How good does he look when he looks to play proper cricketing shots? Not a half-volley by any means but he plans half-forward and laces this into the gap between cover and point. Ball slows down towards the square boundary
beaten as he gets this to nip away off the seam from the fourth-stump.
punches this length ball to mid-on
beaten for pace as this skids back in to hit him high on the pad. Stifled appeal, not out.
defends this full delivery back to the bowler
beaten as he pokes at this delivery with an angled bat face. The change of angle seems to be working already for Australia.
works this incoming length ball to midwicket where there's a misfield, and they get through for a single.
away-going length ball which he bunts to the off side
no timing but gets enough on this pull as it races down the hill to the midwicket boundary. This was short, angling away and Dimuth picked the length early and went through with the pull. Lovely.
off a thick inside-edge, Cummins can't believe how that's not cannoned into the stumps! Feeble push at a delivery angling away, no feet. Lucky to survive.
gets a thick inside edge onto the pad as he looks to turn this to the leg side.
takes a step across and drives this into the off side
steered wide of point, down to third man
back of length on middle and leg, tucked off his hips to deep square
squared up a hint as he bunts this into the covers
mistimes this pull into the gap at midwicket
one-handed pull, beats short fine leg. Swivelled nicely and helped it along. Using the bowler's pace very nicely.
not for the first time tonight have we seen a thick inside edge flying past the stumps. Dollops of luck here for the skipper as he is late on the frontfoot drive, races to the fine leg boundary.
hops back and tucks this into the gap at square leg

Richardson bowled, Dimuth defends, but one of them attempted this delivery in half-heated fashion. Replays confirm Dimuth wasn't entirely read. Dead ball. So he'll rebowl that? Okay, umpire says it's a legal ball as the batsman ended up facing it
on the pads and he's clipped this wide of short fine leg. Easy, very easy. Nothing more than a warm-up delivery. Help-me-on-its-way welcome drink
beaten as he looks to slap this away
right behind the line as he blocks
hammered, absolutely hammered. Some effort that from Pat Cummins to run around from deep square to where a deep midwicket would be. Saved two runs for the side
hoicked across the line to deep square leg
shades of Jayasuriya! Width and he clobbers this length ball over the extra cover boundary. Stand and deliver
clipped into the gap and they take two more

they chance a single of the type Sehwag did after tucking one to mid-on and taking on Lehmann's throw in that 2003 final. This time, there's an overthrow from Finch and they get five (four overthrows). It's all going Sri Lanka's way so far. Kusal threw himself in desperation to complete the run, but not sure even that dive would've saved him if it was a direct hit.
superbly flicked down to deep square leg
right behind the line of this incoming length ball as he defends
slipping down leg and he tickles this past short fine leg. Pacy, angling in and all he had to do was get some bat along the way.
on middle and leg, worked behind square on the leg side
pulled across the line, not timed all that well but he'll come back for the second

dismissed from his presence! Banged in short, Perera wallops this pull in front of square. Raced away to the fence. Tired delivery from Richardson, not going to help bowling such lengths in the mid-130s. Cracking stroke that has forced a new bat on its way. The Sri Lankan fans in the stands are loving it, absolutely loving it.

beaten, extra bounce that time. Looked to run it down. Richardson and Carey think there may be something here, right on the edge and Finch reviews with two seconds on the clock. Let's see if there is a spike there. Replays come back with a straight line, which means there is no spike and Kusal can continue batting. Not out and Australia lose a review.
slapped to the man at sweeper cover, Khawaja it is
gets half-forward and bunts this into the off side
shaped up to slog-sweep but ended up easing this tossed up delivery to cover
squirts this back to the bowler off a thick inside edge.
sliding into middle and leg, tucked wide of square leg for an easy single
slips this down leg, wide called as Dimuth looks to tickle this fine with the angle.
gets well forward and stabs this away
drifts in a long way from around the stumps, hit on the pad as he looks to work this wide of midwicket
onto the backfoot as he works this from outside off towards the gap at deep square and deep midwicket. Excellent running.
slashed away up and over point, this plonks towards the square third man boundary and they get a couple
hops across and bunts this half-pull to short fine leg
sways out of the way of this short ball, excellent delivery
gets besides the line as he punches this short of length delivery to cover

he's clubbed this pull over midwicket, Khawaja may have got an inch on that one but it's not enough. Dimuth has a half-century and his mates are on their feet, as are the fans. What a superb knock so far.
hops back and defends this short of length delivery.
width and he slaps this to deep point

massive appeal for lbw, not given but Australia can't review. Deceived in flight as he looks to skip out, plays all around it and is beaten by the drift. Looked out to me.. Poor decision from Illingworth.
gets well forward and bunts it back to the bowler
works this with the angle to deep midwicket, the 100's up for Sri Lanka.
swept from outside off to short fine leg
works this down to deep square leg
squeezes this drive into the covers for an easy single
full on the stumps at 146kph, defended back
works this length ball from middle to deep square leg
goes right back into his crease to defend this short of length delivery.
arches back and helps this short delivery along to third man
ripper of a yorker, Kusal squeezes this into the leg side to bring up a 33-ball half-century.
punches this down to long-off
drifts in and straightens, Karunaratne defends this back to the bowler
turns this to short fine, saw him coming and cleverly shortened his length

whips this into the huge gap between mid-on and deep midwicket. Excellent fielding, excellent running. Shaun Marsh covered good ground and then was off balance and going over the ropes -airborne - as he flicked it back
leg-side line not favouring him, worked to square leg, sensible from Kusal
steps out and flicks this full delivery on the pads to deep midwicket
using Starc's pace to steer this over the infield, bounced over the point fielder's head as he hit it hard into the ground
imperious flick down to deep square. Balance and timing all in sync

the middle stump is flattened! full, straight and the wicket comes as Kusal misses an attempted mow to the leg side. Australia get a breakthrough they desperately needed. Finch's decision to bring back his trump card works.
gets on top of the bounce and turns this uppishly behind leg gully to get off the mark
controls this gentle nudge to the leg side, kept it down.
helped along, no slip and it races to the third man boundary. All he had to do was hit it wide of the keeper, which he did.
turns this to short fine for a quick single
slips this down leg, worked to fine leg
nicely tossed up, he covers the line as he gets forward and defends
pushed straight to Smith at cover
nicely tossed up, got this to dip on Thiri as he lunges forward and defends
quicker ball sliding in, pushed to midwicket. Good, tight over that from Maxwell.
139kph, good length, angled into off stump, he defends across the line working it to midwicket
good length, fourth stump line, he defends from the crease and Maxwell is in quickly from point

nearly a run out! Khawaja misses the underarm! Thirimanne was gone. It was a good length, defending to midwicket, Dimuth called quickly but Thirimanne was slow to go, Khawaja swooped, dived and underarmed but missed
good length, off stump line, he defends off a thick outside edge to backward point
145kph, good length, tailing in a touch to off, he defends solidly on the front foot
147kph, half volley, firmly driven on the front foot straight back to Starc who does well in his follow through
tossed up, he skips out and mistimes a drive to mid on who is deep
shorter and wider, he's back cutting to the sweeper at deep point
tossed up, on off, he drives back to the bowler
87kph, tossed up, drifting in, he whips this through forwards square to the man in the deep
drifting into leg stump, he clips this with the drift through midwicket
brilliant late cut! This was a poor delivery. He pushed an arm ball through wide of off, he sat back and waited and placed it perfectly between the two men behind point
good length, angled into off, he defends on the front foot
131kph, good length, fifth stump line, he opens the face and runs this to third man
he shuffles forward, it's a touch shorter, he clips this off the hip behind square in the gap for a couple
short and wide, he late cuts in the air through the vacant gully to third man
135kph, full outside off, he strides forward and drives elegantly but straight to cover
132kph, good length, off stump line, he defends on the front foot
87kph, drifting down leg, it comes off pad and runs fine
tossed up, he skips down and clips this on the move to long on
angled into leg stump, he glances this fine to fine leg to rotate the strike
a mix up but Khawaja throws to the wrong end! It was a late cut to shot third man but Dimuth didn't run, Khawaja threw to the keeper and Thirimanne got home easily
drifting into leg, he tucks this through square leg
drifting into leg stump, he tries to whip but misses and is taken on the front pad
full outside off, he square drives to deep cover-point
full angled into off, he works this off the front foot to mid on
133kph, good length on off, he drives on the up dragging this mid on
good length outside off, he closes the face trying to work to leg, gets a leading edge that runs to third man
good length, top of off, he's forced to defend on the front foot
back of a length, top of off, he defends from the crease into the off side
attempted reverse sweep to a ball down leg, he paddles it onto his foot
tossed up, he drives towards long off but Maxwell cuts it off
looped up outside off, he drives to long off this time
he advances and lofts this over midwicket, but doesn't time it, deep midwicket comes in and gathers on the bounce
shorter on middle, he stands tall and punches to long on
tossed up on off, he leans forward playing around his front pad, working this to forward square for one
driven on the up past cover, they take on the throw from Richardson in the deep, Dimuth is stretched at the non-striker's a direct hit would have had him!

nearly another run out at the non-striker's end! This ball climbed off a length, it came off the arm of Thirimanne and goes behind point, Dimuth calls him through, Maxwell swoops and fires at the non-striker's and just misses!
130kph, good length on off, he's back and working this through square leg to the sweeper
cracking square drive on the up through backward point! Too much width and he stood tall and thrashed it behind point with amazing power.

caught behind! Behrendorff breaks through! He tried to square drive again on the up but this was much tighter to off and a little shorter, he was cramped attempting the shot, got a thin edge to Carey! Behrendorff has his first World Cup wicket
133kph, short on the hip, he glances this off the back foot to fine leg
good length, fifth stump line, he defends from the crease
138kph, back of a length, climbing outside off, he's back and knocking this down into the off side
138kph, full angled into off, he pushes a drive to mid on
bouncer, angled well down the leg side
good length,143kph, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot
134kph, back of a length, fifth stump line, he sits back and runs this down to third man with an angled bat
136kph, high bouncer, he ducks well underneath it
134kph, good length, angled across, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
131kph, good length, leg stump line, he works this into the gap at midwicket
131kph, good length, wide of off, he sits back and glides this to third man
135kph, head high bouncer, he swivels and pulls beautifully, rolling the wrists but nailing it straight to backward square
angled into off, 136kph, he works this to midwicket, Khawaja makes the diving save
136kph, angled in and whipped from off stump straight to the man at midwicket
139kph, good length but angled into leg and he clips this neatly off the hip
shorter and wider, he late cuts to third man with control
145kph, angled down leg and he glances easily to fine leg again
139kph, full outside off, he drives but doesn't time it well to mid off
141kph, shorter length, he upper cuts to third man but it lands well short of the fielder
fuller length, 144kph, wide of off, he mistimes a drive to mid off
he walks down the track and flicks this extravagantly behind square, but he didn't middle it, he gets a couple
133kph, full angled into off, his head falls a touch as he whips to mid on
nearly bowled! This was a good length angled in, he tried to pull the length ball, it shot low under the bat and just past off stump
he steps forward, gets a length ball wide of off and runs it to third man
good length, on leg, he glances this fine to fine leg
133kph, he drives on the up, gets a thick edge that runs along the ground to third man
134kph, good length, angled in towards off, he defends on the front foot
angled in to off, good length, he works this off the front foot behind square, they run well and pinch two
133kph, bouncer outside off, he pulls but is beaten by the extra bounce
131kph, good length wide of off, he sits back and runs this to third man with a horizontal bat
good length, 138kph, outside off, he opens the face of the bat and guides it to third man
129kph, short ball, pulled powerfully, in the air behind square but Marsh gets there on the bounce to cut it off
drifting down leg, he glances this straight to backward square
tossed up, he dances down and works this neatly through midwicket
looped up outside off, he opens the face and runs it to short third man
angled into leg stump, he clips this square of midwicket
flatter and quicker, he cuts from close to off stump straight to backward point
pushed through on off, he's back and working this through midwicket
134kph, good length, angled in, he defends on the front foot
126kph, good length wide of off, he eases into a drive through extra cover to the sweeper
131kph, full outside off, he tries to drive down the ground but gets it straight back to the bowler
good length, 130kph, he defends from the crease with an open blade to gully
133kph, good length, angled into off, he defends from the crease who is tight in on the one
hooked in the air but it falls well short of fine leg. He didn't get any of it. The extra bounce surprised him and he wasn't in control but all is OK.
looped up on off, he works it with the spin to midwicket
tossed up again, he skips down and drives to long on
drifting into leg, he clips this straight to square leg in the ring
drifting into leg again, he glances this straight to short fine
tossed up, he advances and drives neatly to long on
launched straight down the ground! There we go! He skipped out, got the length he wanted and lofted through the line straight down the ground and to the sight screen! Super shot

caught at backward point! Oh no! Three short of a magical hundred. It was short and wide, there to cut for four, but he just guided it, didn't try and get over the top of it or hit it up and over Maxwell at backward point. He picked him out. Catching practice for Maxwell. What a massive blow that is
over-pitched and driven easily straight of mid on! Genuine half-volley first up and Mathews didn't have to be asked twice to put that away
good length, angled into off, he defends from the crease
130kph, bouncer, well directed, he ducks under it well
back of a length, on off, he defends from the crease
fuller length, angled into off, he pushes on the front foot to mid on
angled into leg, he works this off the front foot behind square
shorter length, he's back and whipping this through forward square to the sweeper
shorter length, he's back and punching this to cover
shorter down leg, he gets down on one knee and paddles it to short fine
round arm flatter ball, he stands up and punches it straight to midwicket
round arm again at the heels of Mendis, he clips this behind square
good length, top of off, he defends from the crease covering up the stumps
thumped back over the bowler's head! Off Starc no less! Mid off and mid on were up, this was up in the slot and he swings through the line and crushes it straight at the sight screen. What a shot.
full and wide, he square drives to deep cover-point
short lifter outside off, he drops his knees and sways underneath it
141kph short outside off, he's up on his toes pushing this behind point and Maxwell makes a fabulous diving save. he is a gun in that position
chest high and pulled behind square! Super shot. Not short enough and he controlled it beautifully into the gap between the two men in the deep
hops back and defends this skiddy short of length delivery.
tucks this gently off his hip to square leg
short of length again, Mathews is caught on the hop but he defends again

he's gloved this down leg! This was short, angling in towards his ribs, Mathews tried to avoid by trying to take him on with the hook shot, swivels a touch too late and gloves it through to the keeper. Massive blow.
pulled in front of square, Richardson comes around to cut that off at deep midwicket
driven on the up to sweeper cover
slips this length ball down leg, wide called.
shows the full face of the bat to defend this to mid-on
full, straight and boom! Plays all around this full delivery, misses. The ball tails in to beat the inside edge, deflect off the pad and smash the stumps. The procession continues.
swivels back and helps this over fine leg! Short, slanting in, Thisara took him on, was looking away but made clean contact. Is there life in the game yet?
flicks this full delivery to deep square leg
prods outside the line, squirts one off the inside edge to the keeper.
he's chipped this straight to mid-on, good catch by Warner. He was looking to whip this over the infield, didn't get it off the middle. That's the end of Sri Lanka's hopes, me thinks
length on middle and leg, tucks this down to fine leg
right behind the line of this away-going length ball as he defends.
on the pads, flicked into the gap at deep midwicket
slants this away-going length across, defended from the crease
squared up but he gets a thick edge down to square third man
pulled but no timing, straight to deep square leg.
thin edge and gone! Slants a pacy delivery across Kusal who looks to heave this across the line, the pace is too good for him. Gleefully accepted by Carey.
squeezes the drive to deep cover
yorker-length, tails away late, squirts this wide of point
squirts a thick outside edge to third man, looking to flick this incoming delivery that was angled to the base of middle from around the stumps.
hops back and defends
gorgeous off-drive, Warner at mid-off with a full-length dive but can't stop. Timed superbly.
slashed over point, races to the boundary like a tracer bullet. Too much width
bunts this short of length delivery to the off side
ducks under this short ball without much of a hassle
punched straight to cover
zips past the thigh pad but the angle down leg means its a wide
superb stop at third man by Behrendorff! Looks to flay this over point but gets a thick outside edge. Dive saves a couple of runs
looks to back away and flat-bat this over the stands, but only manages to slice it high in the air as Finch, back-tracking from mid-off, takes an excellent catch on the move.
backs away and squirts this yorker on middle to deep cover. Gave Starc a candid view of all three stumps there
right into the blockhole, tails away late but he manages to get some bat on it
length on middle, defended
attacks his toe with a 147kph thunderbolt, somehow manages to bring his bat in front to keep it out.
full toss, eased to deep cover
full toss on off, punches straight to mid-off
short ball on middle, somehow manages to get some body behind the line and block
backs away to carve behind point, Richardson shortened his length and got it to bounce a touch more than Malinga anticipates, beaten
squeezes this full delivery to cover

chips it straight to cover, Khawaja can't ask for an easier catch. The end is near. Excellent change of pace, this is the split-finger slower ball, length on the fuller side, Malinga backed away possibly to hit it over the infield but ended up spooning it to the fielder.
jams his bat down to keep this yorker from cannoning into the base of off-stump.
squeezes this yorker back to the bowler
helps this down to fine leg, turns down the single
scorching drive but straight to mid-off
solid forward defence to a full delivery angling in towards the stumps
brings out the short-arm jab, timed superbly but straight to deep midwicket. Refuses the run again
thick edge, down to third man
makes room and steers this down to third man
short of length on middle, he hops back and defends
sways out of the way of this slower bouncer
backs away, bowler follows him, cramped for room but keeps it out
hops back and defends this incoming length ball
pulled all along the ground to deep square leg
looks to back away and slap over point but is beaten for pace
has a big swipe at this length ball outside off, beaten again.
toe-ends a wild slog to mid-on
slower and fuller, backs and leaves. Bizarre?
yorker-length outside off, squeezed to mid-off

walks across and scoops this on the bounce to Behrendorff at short fine. Hint of confusion there, but the fielder gave a clear indication that he isn't sure. Soft signal is not out. Not out it will stay. Clear bump ball.
reverse-scoop that flies over short fine off the back part of the bat. Just eluded Behrendorff as he was back-pedaling.
top-edges a pull, falls in no man's land at midwicket.
swing and a miss. Backed away and swing it towards Lord's.
walks across and looks to pull, beaten.
defends with an angled bat to the off side
punches to cover
hangs his bat up in the air even as he tries to evade this bouncer, lobs into the square leg region
edged and taken! Pradeep backs away to slog, swings blindly and ends up nicking behind. Fourth win in five matches for Australia as they move to the top of the points table.
